monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Creates a mushroom obstacle - Activates ground switches
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: 1000 Leaves
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Shield all allies for 1 x (600 + 75% Defense)

skills.name: Antitoxins
skills.description: At the beginning of each turn, heal a random Debuff from this Monster.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Initial Poison
skills.description: Apply Poison (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Leaf Slash
skills.description: 3 x 50% (150%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Leaf Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 200% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poisoned Nerves
skills.description: Unique Aura: Poison (Debuff) also reduces enemy's Mana Regeneration by 10%.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Sensitivity
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness causes enemies to take 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Slime-ageddon
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison & Weakness (Debuffs)

skills.name: Spell Mastery
skills.description: Every magical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Magic value.

skills.name: Spore
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Nebula
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Supremacy
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.
